description: This movement intensive class is a blend of the art and the science of the body in dancing. It
focuses on integrating an artistic approach to moving with a physical experience that deepens
awareness of the body in motion and enhances understanding of body structure and function.
This class also links to the content and focus in Dance 201 The Body Moveable and Dance 301
Advanced Body Moveable. Prerequisite: Dance 111 or Dance 121 or Dance 210/211 or Dance
220/221, or permission of instructor. Offered annually.
